features: This classic Kasulaperu Haaram showcases the revered Lakshmi coin design, intricately arranged with floral motifs embellished with CZ, rubies and emeralds. The elegant pendant adds a focal point, echoing the floral motif. Each kasu (coin) is meticulously crafted and spaced to create a harmonious and regal look. Delicate pearl drops further enhance its allure. Handcrafted by skilled artisans.

description: A symbol of prosperity and tradition, this Kasulaperu Haaram is not just jewelry; it's an heirloom. The combination of genuine 22K gold, sparkling CZ, and vibrant gemstones ensures lasting value and brilliance. Meticulously handcrafted in Hyderabad by skilled artisans, it embodies cultural heritage and timeless beauty. A perfect investment for generations to cherish.
